Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Toronto in 2005...
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Toronto in 2005...
Injured on 4/18/2006 with a Fractured Hip, out for 9 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2007, off Jon Garland (TB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2007, off Eric Eckenstahler (BAL)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Baltimore, driving in 6 runs on 5/27/2008...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/2010, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Toronto to Colorado on 2/8/2011 (Going to TOR: CF F. Azcarate, 1B Y. Alonso, P H. Boyd. Going to COL: LF R. Braun)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Florida, driving in 4 runs on 5/9/2011...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/2011, hitting .478 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...

Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .411 with 12 HR, 23 RBI...
